article.title: San Francisco U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the San Francisco U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​

San Francisco Office Contact Information

San Francisco U.S. Export Assistance Center
50 Fremont Street, Suite 2450
San Francisco, CA 94105
Phone: 415-705-2300
Fax: 415-705-2299
Email:office.sanfrancisco@trade.gov
Website:http://www.export.gov/california/sanfrancisco

San Francisco Staff

Stephan P. Crawford, USEAC Director
Phone: 415-705-2301
Fax: 415-705-2299
Email:Stephan.Crawford@trade.gov
Industries:Architectural/Constr./Engineering SVC, Pollution Control Eq., Renewable Energy Eq., Water Resources Eq./Services

Daniel Giavina, International Trade Specialist
Phone: 415-705-2281
Fax: 415-705-2299
Email:Daniel.Giavina@trade.gov
Industries:Agricultural Services, Building Products, Consumer Electronics, Cosmetics/Toiletries, Electronic Components, Food Processing/Packaging Eq., Foods - Processed, General Consumer Goods, Giftware, Hotel/Restaurant Eq., Household Consumer Goods, Security/Safety Eq., Sporting Goods/Recreational Eq., Travel/Tourism Services

Jetta DeNend, International Trade Specialist
Phone: 415-744-7728
Fax: 415-705-2299
Email:Jetta.DeNend@trade.gov
Industries:Healthcare Technologies, Health IT, Biotechnology, Medical Eq., Drugs/Pharmaceuticals, IT, Financial Services, Environmental, Education/Training Services, Books/Periodicals, Printing/Graphic Arts Eq.

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the San Francisco U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.seometadatakeyword: export, exporting, assistance, contact, San Francisco, California
